item.title: With golf, gold and deals, Japan’s new prime minister tries to charm Trump
item.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and President Donald Trump inked a rare-earth minerals deal ahead of Trump’s meeting with China’s Xi Jinping.

item.title: Callers to Social Security wait for hours to get help. Hear their ordeals.
item.description: Millions of seniors and disabled people call Social Security’s 1-800 number every month. What they experience is often maddening.

item.title: He wrote a song about not waiting. It’s the hold music at Social Security.
item.description: The story behind the surprisingly catchy hold music at Social Security that millions have heard – and plenty even love.

item.title: A democratic socialist is poised to become New York mayor. Democrats are nervous.
item.description: The party is divided over how much Zohran Mamdani’s rise will matter in 2026 midterm elections that they expect to be dominated by opposition to Trump...

item.title: Citing autopen use, House Oversight Committee finds Biden actions ‘illegitimate’
item.description: A report released Tuesday calls for further DOJ investigation into the Biden administration.
